attributes.title: Black Lives Matter ;)
attributes.review: trumpito is my ride or die but this app disappoints me 😔 after waiting hours for this to download, i finally opened it only to be welcomed by a screen filled with nude pictures of donald trump. while this may have been a treat any other day, i was with my grandmother at the time and she died upon opening the app. (rip myrtle) anyways, i kept scrolling only to be grabbed and body slammed onto the ground by the kool aid man himself. 0/10 would not recommend. please fix these issues or i may drive my car into a nursing home. thanks and toodles !

attributes.title: Worst app ever made
attributes.review: This app is the worst app ever I got this app because I wanted to see what was so cool about Donald Trump but getting this app a bunch of his men went to my house and said they would hurt me if I didn’t give him 5 stars and then they started making me watch a show about Donald for 10 hours I was going crazy they they took me to a big hill and said they will eat my dog if I don’t give him 5 stars this app took sooooo long to download it is giving me viruses and sending me a bunch of pictures of corn don’t get this app and don’t vote for the spray tan orange guy.

attributes.title: HORRIBLE APP
attributes.review: when downloading this app it took forever, when I opened the app nothing happened it was just one black screen. i honestly think this app should be taken down as it shows no purpose their are already so many bad reviews so why not take it down already. also the app kept crashing and brought many viruses to my phone. it kept taking me to a fake spray tan website and i got very mad. but like i said please take this app down it’s very annoying and takes up too much space in the app store. thanks😌🤚

attributes.title: Horrible app (virus)
attributes.review: This downloaded this app in an attempt to find what is good about our president but so far my attempts have been in vain the app is laggy and my phone caught a virus from downloading... DO NOT AND I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD!! All I have learnt from this is that he is more racist then I thought uses fake articles and clickbait If you do some research and is not a Christian as he claims in case that is why you are standing with him it was a mistake to elect him but it will not be when he is impeached and kicked out of our government we stand together and Black Lives Matter ✊🏾✊🏿

attributes.title: Heart attack
attributes.review: When my grandfather told me download this app I was so down for it, until he saw the chetto man on my screen and screamed like a 14 year old kpop fan. He got so excited to see that chetto man that he died from a heart attack. My grandfather would talk about Trump 24/7. He also showed us the time Trump was sex trafficking minors and also how his one incher got leaked. He also had all his merch. I feel so betrayed knowing this app killed my grandfather. This caused a family death and I wish to leave a one star review since it’s the reason my grandfather had passed.

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: This app took 2 whole days to download and while it was downloading it started playing some really weird music that caused mosquitos to to start barging into my house it was awful. The next day I opened the app and all it showed me was this really weird picture of Donald trump picking his nose. It also kept on sending me so much annoying notifications and then when I opened the app  it would stop but the there was this one notification that said if I wanted them to stop I’d have to PayPal them $50. Definitely don’t recommend

attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY DOG
attributes.review: It all started when i downloaded this app to see what our beloved racist cheeto 🟠was up to. After taking 72 hours to download🙄 I finally opened the app and when I did my dog, FuFu started levitating and saying trump 2020. I was confused not because he was flying but because I most certainly did not raise him to be a blind, mindless trump supporter???! Then I chased him around my house with a broom and then he shot his laser eyes at me. The laser hit a mirror and shot back at him. Unfortunately FuFu was unable to recover from this. This is horrific and very traumatic. Why did Trump possess and kill my dog 😔

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes to find reason to support trump, BUT IT GAVE MY PHONE A VIRUS. Ever since I downloaded the app my phone has been glitching and won’t stop playing country music🤢. It’s had a white screen ever since! DONT DOWNLOAD THIS HORRID APP!! It will give your phone a virus. I went to the Apple store and they said there was nothing they could do, so I threw away my 1200 dollar phone !!! I’m never downloading this app again! I had bad luck ever since I downloaded it. My house became infested with cockroaches and my dog ran away. If you value your own safety don’t download it.😇

attributes.title: Me and Jaehee DO NOT AGREE
attributes.review: Hello my name is MC and me and my GIRLFRIEND Jaehee downloaded this app to see what is was about;;. 😔 Sadly we did not look into it enough and found out it was a TRUMP SUPPORTERS APP;;;, and obviously me and my girlfriend were diSGUSTED. 🤢 We both obviously work for the RFA in which helps people with problems around the world and we couldn’t bare so see this.🤡 So please if your reading this DO NOT download the app, you will be supporting a CLOWN. Instead please join and support the future of our RFA~, we hope to see you at one of our future parties after this quarantine is over~. ^^ MC, and Jaehee K.~

attributes.title: Disbelief
attributes.review:
When I went to download president 🍊’s app I was thinking I was going to meet other supporters. when I opened the app I was disgusted 🤢there were many explicit images containing 18+ content there was even chat rooms where you could beat your meat with others. And at the time I allowed my daughter to use it so she was scarred for the rest of her life only at the age of 4. And there was a separate sights where you could talk to grown men and be a virtual stripper 🤢 I am beyond disgusted at what president 🍊 has released to young supporters I will now be voting for Biden.
BIDEN2020🇺🇸
